list_definition.definition: a small blast of air, wind etc; a gust

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A puff of wind moved the branches.

list_definition.definition: any of various kinds of soft, round, light or hollow objects

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Stop puffing cigarette smoke into my face!

list_definition.definition: to breathe quickly, after running etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was puffing as he climbed the stairs.
